channel.title: Illegal start of expression? help please? (in p16 source)
channel.description: :confused: help please...this is the errors i get.....so how do i remove theese errors? [code]client.java:7378: illegal start of expression public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) { ^ client.java:7975: illegal start of expression public int start[] = {0,0,0,0}; ^ client.java:7976: illegal start of expression public int IPPart1 = 127; ^ client.java:7977: illegal start of expression public int IPPart2 = 0; ^ client.java:7978: illegal start of expression public int IPPart3 = 0; ^ client.java:7979: illegal start of expression public int IPPart4 = 1; ^ client.java:7981: illegal start of expression public void ServerHelp() { ^ client.java:8007: unclosed string literal sendFrame126("::bomb (gives you a weird blinking shit for a few seconds...) ^ client.java:8008: unclosed string literal sendFrame126("::kalph (tele's you to kalapithe lair) ^ client.java:8009: unclosed string literal sendFrame126("::tar (teles you to tzaar) ^ client.java:32071: ';' expected } ^ 11 errors ---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- [/code] so how do i remove theese errors? And dont say read trougth java tutorial...coz i already did....boooring stuff that didnt help me at all.... :P[br][size=1]Posted at: November 10, 2006, 04:26:09 AM[/size][hr]talk to me on PM if you rather want that people

what?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 10:52:55 AM[/size][hr]oh ure offline
[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 12:42:42 PM[/size][hr]can i send my work to anyone that is a good coder and they fix my errors and my compile and give it back fixed? ;)[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 01:02:38 PM[/size][hr]anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 19, 2006, 12:09:52 PM[/size][hr]My Compile do now look like this…

client.java:7378: illegal start of expression public void showQuestCompleted(String questName, int rewardqp) { ^ client.java:7975: illegal start of expression public int start[] = {0,0,0,0}; ^ client.java:7976: illegal start of expression public int IPPart1 = 127; ^ client.java:7977: illegal start of expression public int IPPart2 = 0; ^ client.java:7978: illegal start of expression public int IPPart3 = 0; ^ client.java:7979: illegal start of expression public int IPPart4 = 1; ^ client.java:7981: illegal start of expression public void ServerHelp() { ^ client.java:32093: ';' expected } ^ 8 errors ---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- [br][size=1]Posted at: November 19, 2006, 12:53:00 PM[/size][hr]dont bother changing to testscape much easier i heard

item.title: Illegal start of expression? help please? (in p16 source)
item.dc:creator: @Skating_On_Java Elite2142
item.description:
@Skating_On_Java wrote:


client.java:8007: unclosed string literal
                sendFrame126("::bomb (gives you a weird blinking shit for a few
seconds...)
                             ^
client.java:8008: unclosed string literal
                sendFrame126("::kalph (tele's you to kalapithe lair)
                             ^
client.java:8009: unclosed string literal
                sendFrame126("::tar (teles you to tzaar)
                             ^
client.java:32071: ';' expected
}
   ^
11 errors
---Project16 V.6 by Wolf |-Enabled-| ---

should be

            sendQuest("::bomb [gives you a weird blinking shit for a few seconds...]",8144);
            sendQuest("::kalph [tele's you to kalapithe lair]",8155);
            sendQuest("::tar [teles you to tzaar]",8156);

item.title: Illegal start of expression? help please? (in p16 source)
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

no just the voids

the send frames things are giving you an error because you have put an extra " at the end

so this:
sendFrame126("::kalph (tele’s you to kalapithe lair)

should be this

sendFrame126("::kalph (tele’s you to kalapithe lair")

notice the extra "
